WBUILD.name: You are west of the remnants a large building.
WBUILD.desc:
This building must have been destroyed in the war...You look around and see office chairs, filing cabinets, 
desks, and other general supplies. This must have been a factory or office building...

The war of 2078 was the largest war in history, A nuclear war destroying half 
of the world. You are one of few survivors making it in this world, doing whatever you can to survive...

NBUILD.name: You are north of the remnants of a large building.
NBUILD.desc:
You are now looking at the north side of the building. over the horizon you see the ruined cityscape 
of New York City.

SBUILD.name: You are south of the remnants of a large building.
SBUILD.desc: You are now looking at the south side of the building. You can see an entrance to a subway further south, or a bridge leading over the Hudson to the east

EBUILD.name: You are east of the remnants of a large building.
EBUILD.desc:
You are now looking at the east side of the building. the majority of the building on this side is still
 standing and you can decipher some graphics on the side of the building... it says 

     'Amazon - The World's Leader in Everything!'     

Behind you there is a large cliff dropoff, making no exits except back where you came from.

GAS.name: You are at a gas station down the street.
GAS.desc:
You walk down the street for about a mile until you end up at a gas station. There are broken down gas pumps, 
a few charred and rusty cars and the building is collapsing in, and the windows are all shattered.

SCITY.name: You are now in the south part of the city.

MCITY.name: You are now in the main part of the city.

ECITY.name: You are now in the east part of the city.

WCITY.name: You are now in the west part of the city.

NCITY.name: You are now in the north part of the city.

SUBWAY.name: You are now in the Subway of New York City.
SUBWAY.desc:
You walk down the steps leading into the subway. Newspapers are everywhere, and you see tattered clothes laying around where it looks like 
someone has been sleeping. You don't see anyone around, but a stray dog sees you, barks, and runs off down the subway. The tracks seem to be clear in both directions...

ESUBWAY.name: You are on the train tracks of the subway.

WSUBWAY.name: You are on the train tracks of the subway

BRIDGE.name: You are now on the bridge over the Hudson.

GINSIDE.name: You are now inside of the gas station.
GINSIDE.desc:
You walk over and pull down a piece of cardboard that is hanging off of the door, and walk inside. The place is a disaster, 
and it looks like it has already been ransacked. Some rats scurry around at your feet, and even though you are disgusted, you start to look for anything useful to you.

GCARS.name: You are around the cars in the gas station.
GCARS.desc: You walk over to the destroyed cars and search around, trying to see if you can find anything useful.

GCELLAR.name: You are now in the cellar of the gas station. It is kind of dark in here, but you think you can see a chest sitting in the corner of the room...

GCRATS.name: Woah!
GCRATS.desc:
As you are walking towards the chest, you step on something and you hear it squeal! A large rat goes running away into the darkness. 
You can keep going towards the chest, or decide it's too scary and turn around to go back.

GCHEST.name: You open the chest in the corner of the cellar.
GCHEST.desc: TREASURE! Inside the chest you find items that will help you survive so much!
